original_title: Amazon Music: Holiday Plays - Miley Cyrus
overview: Miley Cyrus performs a six-song set for Amazon Music's 2020 Holiday Plays special, including "Plastic Hearts" from her just-released album of the same name, her single "Midnight Sky" and a cover of Wham!'s "Last Christmas." Cyrus also sits down for an interview with host Lil Nas X.
title: Amazon Music: Holiday Plays - Miley Cyrus
